entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 16. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Near blizzard. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Near blizzard developing this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Near blizzard. Temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon.
